doc.title: Cold Cash
doc.plot: Cold Cash highlight the mundane life of Darryl White. His mother and her partner are always picking on him. He dreams of having his own place and traveling overseas. But this is a distant reality as he works his minimum wage video store job. Nicky starts working at the video store and appears to be the only person interested in what Darryl has to say. But things aren't what they seem when Darryl catches Nicky staging a robbery, the tables turn and suddenly Darryl gets the opportunity to finally live his dreams.
